name: Chiroform CAT Pro Instrument
descr:
Chiroform`s premium thrust adjustment device made from durable stainless steel. The Chiroform CAT Pro comes standard with our new, and more comfortable, Palm and Finger Pads and the extra cervical tip.

It also includes our Cervical Tip, velocity reducer. With 15 reference force settings on the shaft, this device can be adjusted from 20 to 45* AFR.

The warranty on this premium device is 18 months, the longest in the industry.
